Description: The name of the plate to passage
The type of reagent to add to the plate
Notes: Can be changed to different media types

Description: The parent wells to transfer from
The child wells to transfer to
How much of the seed to add
Notes: Array length must match number of wells

Description: The number of times to mix the wells
The volume to use for mixing
The final volume of the well
Whether to keep parent wells alive
Notes: Set to true for repeated passaging
